commnet: Herb is an excellent communicator with a marketing bone and a technical understanding. It's very hard to come across all rounders like him and best of all, he is 100% on time.

bio:
To maximize the sales of your solution, you need to ensure your influence matches the Buyer’s Interest Level.

Herb Hagell is uniquely qualified to present your software products to the marketplace, gaining you market share and increasing your Return on Investment.

 25 + years as an IT employee and as a consultant in education, insurance and finance, food service, distribution, retail, manufacturing, communications, information technology and software.
 Sales team for an IT outsourcing organization, helping to land several clients.
 Direct sales at the kitchen table… ‘toughest environment there is’.
 Experience in software design and development, Computer Room Operations Management, Technical Support Management.
Ten years ago, while polishing documentation for a software product he developed for a client, the Project Manager commented that he had  probably graduated in science, and not English. “I took that as a challenge, and moved from technical writing to user-oriented .”

Generally available on phone or skype, by appointment. 

Prefer 1/3 deposited in escrow (safepay) when engaged, all remaining funds due at final deliverable.

Webace is an internet solution company that helps firms to grow in an digital environment,  we enjoy what we do. It’s what we believe. We are a independent company with several years experience in Web design, SEO and Email marketing, we aspire high standards of work and we achieved results for a number of a clients of all form and sizes all across the world.

bio:
I am an independent narrator who helps large and small businesses sound
more professional by enhancing their training video soundtracks, voicemail, and commercials with high-quality narration. My voice isdynamic with warm tonal qualities.

I have performed on radio stations in rural as well as populous Front Range Colorado, which indicates that I am comfortable at the microphone and work efficiently in the booth.

I use my Samson Q7 microphone in my studio because it picksup all the voice nuances with exceptional clarity and detail ensuring that your recordings sound clear.
I work on short hourly or long term projects.  Negotiable rates.

abstrac: Genie Desk – We Create Offshore Workforce Solutions
bio:
At Genie Desk we're transparent, friendly and want to cut your staff cost. We offer the offshore industry's most affordable services via 2 service offers.  


Offshore Recruitment Solutions – cut out the middle man!

Not only do we have physical representation in the Philippines and India, we also collaborate with a number of local recruitment agents providing us (and you!) access to offshore Social Media networks and other channels not advertised online.And yes, we've got hands on recruitment experience from London, Melbourne...

Personal / Admin. Assistants – from $2.19/ hour*
SEO Specialists – from $2.90 / hour*
Programmers – from $4.10 / hour*

* Indicative hourly rates based on 172 / hours month salary. Excludes $349 – $499 one-off recruitment fee.


PAs ByTheHour– only pay for what you use!

Personal Assistants – from $8.99/ hour

Our PAs-by-the-hour plans are charged like any mobile phone plan, top-up or subscription. The service gives you access to a team of Genie Desk PAs who'll perform one-off projects or administrative tasks on-demand for busy individuals like you. You tell us what to do and we'll do it. 

If not a one-off project - you'll get a free trial, can cancel at any time, only pay for the time you use in 5 minute blocks, can reach us 365 days...people like us because existing customers can use us for free, just spread the word and we'll top up your account with free PA hours. 

Ready to pay less?Contact Genie Desk today…
